title: Neo Angelique Abyss
resume: Arcadia is plagued with evil, life-draining demons called Thanatos  and a vast lack of Purifiers to exterminate them all. While attending  school, Angelique attracts the eye of a man who intends to turn the  tides to the people's favor. What lies within her is the key to  Arcadia's survival.
